website_summaries.verdict: Customers love how the fan beats the competition when it comes to ceiling fans with remotes.
pros: Compact fan that circulates air without excess noise
The remote is easy to operate from anywhere in the room
Comes with an additional light for evenings
cons: If the remote stops working, there isn't another way to operate the fan

customer_reviews.title: ... quite a bit of different components however it is pretty easy for one person to put together particularly with ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan has quite a bit of different components however it is pretty easy for one person to put together particularly with features like the ceiling plate hooks. The fan is low profile enough that it doesn't make my low ceiling obvious. It is really quiet on all speeds and powerful. Overall a good looking sturdy fan at a great price point. My only concern would be if something happens to the remote there is no other way to operate the fan/light. Another reviewer mentioned facing the Hunter logo away from view which was a good call since I wanted the fan to wash into the white ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little low profile fan. It was surprisingly easy to assemble and it works great. The two standard screw in led bulbs light up the room well and the fan operation is near silent. The only thing I hear is the air moving when on hi speed; on low speed I don't hear a thing. I would definitely recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ken L.

customer_reviews.title: They work great! They are very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these lighted, remote control fans. They work great! They are very quiet, especially on the lowest setting, which gives a good breeze. I actually just ordered another one, a larger size (54") for another room in my house. These ones are 44" and work great in my 11'x12' room and my 11'x14' room. They are white and blend right in with the 8' ceiling. They come down 11". Also, the light has a dimmer that can be set on the remote. I had them installed by a friend electrician for $100.00 each. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen

customer_reviews.title: Loud humming noise, returned and the replacement was loud too with mismatch light globe color.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of this fan (#59244) and it was somewhat easy to install by myself. However, I do not understand how only one reviewer mentioned the loud the humming noise !? I returned the first one in thinking that I got a bad product, but the second one was the same . False advertisement for "whisper quiet", No way to have this in bed room. Also, the light globe of the replacement was more blue -greenish color and not only did not reproduce the warm led light at 3000k but also did not match the overall white color of the fan. It seems to me that quality control is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: T. T. Ramah

customer_reviews.title: Problem with light flickering. Be aware - this is not an isolated case.
customer_reviews.text: The fan is okay but the light flickers. We used the LED bulbs that came with the fan. It's very annoying that every few minutes the light will go out and come back on over and over. If you do a quick google search you will see others having the exact same problem. It seems to be the wattage limiter. I wish I had checked prior to ordering. We paid a handyman to install the fan so it's not easy to uninstall and return the fan without losing all the money we paid but may have no choice. Not happy with this fan at all.
customer_reviews.author: C8992

customer_reviews.title: This is great for a room with a low ceiling -- Fan moves air well.
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find a low-profile ceiling fan that is really "low-profile." We measured many that made the claim but this one fit the best for our circumstances. The controls are easy to use (though I'm not sure I like putting the remote on the light switch). We have found the fan on 'low' to be just perfect for moving air in the upstairs bedroom, without making things too cold. The installation was easy (if you have a modicum of experience with electrical) and the final result was mounted solidly on the ceiling. Overall, this was a perfect choice for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Whitmer

customer_reviews.title: Too Loud
customer_reviews.text: As I read in other reviews, it has a very noticable humming , and also pulsating noise. My 15 year old fan it replaced was nearly silent. I'll be returning this and looking for something else. Surprised as my previous hunter fan that about around 6 or 7 years ago was excellent. Maybe things have changed.
customer_reviews.author: sharky65

customer_reviews.title: so good. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell if this product holds up, but so far, so good. Easy to install. Sits exactly flush with the ceiling. Comes with LED bulbs. The thing I like most is that it's remote-operated but comes with a mount for your wall switch so that you can leave the remote docked (see photo). There are 3 fan speeds, and you can brighten and dim the light by holding down the light button on the remote. I ended up buying two more of these for other bedrooms in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Has serious power surge issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these fans for my newly built home. While the style is sort of stubby (like a fire plug), I thought that the Hunter Fan reputation would provide a high quality fan. Other reviewers have complained about this same issue - the fan's lights will flash on momentarily every 2 minutes or so, whether you have the lights on or not. If the lights are on, they momentarily become brighter. The light flashing issue makes these fans impossible to have on while sleeping. I have reached out to Hunter Fan's help desk to resolve this issue to no avail. Unfortunately, I will have to un-install them and return to Amazon. Very strange issue from such a large company.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Get an Electrician for Installation -- This is Not Your Mom's Ceiling Fan
customer_reviews.text: Two of my handymen walked away from installing this model even after Hunter Support offered Spanish-speaking support. My electrician (who speaks perfect English and specializes in ceiling fan and A/C installation) stated that this was one of the most 'annoying' fans he had ever installed! End result is that after installation Hunter Support could not explain to me why the remote would not dim the LED light and wanted me to dismantle the light kit to reverse the fan's direction. I declined as it was put in the center of a 750 square feet studio apartment. So, it's a beautiful product but cost me to have it installed correctly and still have no answer on remote.
customer_reviews.author: vacadoug

customer_reviews.title: Fan stopped in two days / light flickering every 10min
customer_reviews.text: The design is decent and it seemed well made. However the fan stopped in two days. At first, I reached out the company to get some advice but no reply - I had to return it and order for the replacement. Thanks Amazon, the replacement process was easy and smooth. The replacement arrived in a few days. It doesn't have a fan issue though, when I turn on the light, it flickers before fully turned on, then every 10 minutes it flickers repeatedly. Still, fan works great in this time though. I am about to return this 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda Kim

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not work when transmitter is wired into the circuit. When the transmitter is left out then the light fixture works, otherwise it will flicker once and only once when the light switch is turned on. Turn the light switch to off and back on and it will flicker once again, etc. When the transmitter is not wired in, the light works. I haven't used the remote feature at all to simplify the troubleshooting process. Additionally I had a friend that is an electrician redo the installation to verify that it isn't the wiring. He encountered the exact same issue. I regret waiting so long to do the installation that I can't return it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ansong

customer_reviews.title: Installation simple and straight forward, Gives good air movement.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions for installing assembling the fan and connecting the dimming and variable speed modules were not difficult. The integrated light fixture gives the unit a compact look. The LED bulbs adequately illuminate our kitchen when at their brightest and create a nice atmosphere when at their dimmest. Best of all, the fan is barely audible. The heat from the wood stove which is almost under the fixture is nicely circulated through the lower level of the cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Miller Tyme

customer_reviews.title: Hunter Fans customer service impossible to work with.
customer_reviews.text: After I installed the fan we noticed the fan or lights would turn on and then turn off on their own. I talked with the hunter customer service people and they said the remote receiver was causing the problem. They said they would replace the receiver after I sent them proof of purchase. I sent hunter fans every document that I received from Amazon but they said they needed a (final details page). Any help in getting this document would be a great help. I will never buy another Hunter Fan.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Lights Flicker Off and On Repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very quiet but the lights flicker off and on about every 2 minutes so you cannot use the fan at night time. Very annoying. We installed two of these and both fans have some problem. Looks like this is a common problem with the most recent reviews I see on Amazon. I'll be calling Hunter customer service and see how stellar their customer service is or is not.
customer_reviews.author: Jadnohr

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working one year into use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this fan for my son’s room...until it stopped working a year after purchase. I’ve reached out to the manufacturer for support — we will see if they respond. Otherwise, the fan was quiet and discrete. Pretty annoyed I’ll have to for installation for a second fan. I expected more from Hunter and am hopeful their customer service will come through, but in the meanwhile, can’t offer a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and sleek but runs on the same switch
customer_reviews.text: The fan is nice and sleek. It’s easy to install, as long as you follow the instructions. FYI, you have to complete the installation, including hooking up the lights before you can see if it works or not. It’s very quiet, even on full speed. Bright light. Downside is that both the light and fan run on the same wall switch and then you have to use the remote to turn light or fan off. For this reason, we’ll be returning it as we want the fan on one wall switch and the fan on another. A shame because it’s a really nice fan.
customer_reviews.author: Mallafri

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly  Just got my part from Hunter Service Dpt.
customer_reviews.text: After install, noticed that the unit would flick off about every 4-5 minutes and quickly re-start. They are sending me a new wire harness. The service department was great. After I install the harness, I will add to the review. BTW, the fans is very quiet and unit looks nice. Installation was rather easy...even for this 69 year old. BUT, now I have to stand on that ladder again. Well, I have just installed the wiring harness and everything is functioning properly. The service department was easy to call, and they sent out my part immediately. I have now upped my stars to 5. Just a little inconvenient, but they responded without any hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and amazing
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations I've NEVER LOVED a ceiling fan but this fan is a beautiful addition to my bedroom the fact that it's remote control operated just blows it way up there in stars!!!! I hear not the breeze coming from the fan on its highest level is enough to turn down my ac which was my goal and the light is just right I didn't personally I stall But asked my install guy who mentioned that they made it easy by adding some feature that gave him ability to install with no help he installed it in about 15min
customer_reviews.author: TIFFANY RICHARDSON

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: Trusting the Hunter brand and finding few ceiling fans of this price range with a remote control, I got this one. It is nicely finished and the installation after removing the original fan was straight forward. Styling is not exactly to my liking for a bedroom. Seems too bulky although modern looking. It might look better in an office or living room except it does not move enough air at low quiet settings for a larger room. My other criticism is that it does not have a fan reversal switch on the remote or even the fan itself something even cheap fans have.
customer_reviews.author: darile

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan, Poor Instructions
customer_reviews.text: A very nice , quiet fan with bright LED bulb, once you get it assembled. . I recommend attempting , temporarily, putting all screws where they will eventually go during step by step assembly, as screwing into sheet metal to start threads while the fan is hanging can be extremely frustrating. Also, instructions mention a groundigs screw on one of the parts, but do not say what to do with it ( I attached a piece of wire that I had from other jobs and attached it to the other ground wires to insure a good ground. the remote did not work as stated, asthere were no batteries in it, tryig to oped the remote without instructions was very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking, with bright light
customer_reviews.text: Ended up buying a second one after we were impressed with how bright the light is. The 100W=equivalent bulbs went back to Home Depot when we realized they were not needed because the provided bulb was adequate for my wife's sewing room where she had been complaining about the weak light from the existing ceiling fan. That was a halogen bulb-equipped fan that did not impress. As the spare bedroom had the same fan, with the same shortcoming, we decided to replace them both.
customer_reviews.author: Springbok

customer_reviews.title: The fan is great, installing it not so much
customer_reviews.text: The fan is really nice once it is up. Even on the high setting it is pretty quiet, at least quieter than any other fan I have owned. Installing can be pain 3 hands would be helpful with the canopy screws. I do not know if they sent me the wrong screws they refused to screw in, so I got different screws from my basement and it worked, but 3 hands would be nice one to hold the motor and the other 2 to help with the screws. Installing the blades you also could use 3 hands as mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Loud motor.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a Hunter fan for many years now so I thought this one would be as quiet as the previous fan. Not only does it make a loud humming noise when the fan is on, but I had to replace the receiver inside the fan using the warranty service from Hunter because the lights would blink and make a low humming noise every few seconds. The Hunter brand universal receiver they sent seems to have fixed the blinking lights for now, but there is still a loud humming noise when the fan is on. This fan is not "Whisper quiet" at all.
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, useless bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and was pretty easy to install. The fan puts out a nice breeze and is quite. The one negative is the bulbs that came with it. I read some negative reviews and still wasn't prepared for how ridiculously dim they are on the brightest setting. The lighting looks like something that would come from weak back generator safety light. I have to go buy some other bulbs and I'm not sure why Hunter would include them as they make the fan seem defective. Edit: I don’t think the bulbs are the problem. It would seem that the dimming feature doesn’t allow for max brightness. Turn off the feature and the room is properly lit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Fan emits a smell like motor oil
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful fan, but it off-gasses a smell like oil. Called Hunter and they said the smell is "not harmful" and to run the fan on high in one direction for 24 hours, and then run it in the opposite direction for 24 hours. I decided to replace the fan to see if it was any better, but the second fan did the same thing. It's been 48 hours and the smell is still there.
customer_reviews.author: E.H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan and remote is great but light flickers
customer_reviews.text: I like to look and features and was hoping for the "Hunter" quality, as I've had many years of service from other Hunter fans I've had, but this was a bit disappointing. The lights flicker and is a bit disconcerting when you're expecting it to be on continuously. I tried changing the LED bulb, but that didn't help at all, so I'm assuming it's an electrical problem with the hardware. I purchased 3 fans and they all did the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Leong

customer_reviews.title: No remote in the package!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this fan but there was no remote in the package. It has already been installed and now I can't use it. Very frustrating. I reached out to the manufacturer but they are closed on weekends. Don't you hate that when you buy something and are excited about it and there are parts missing? I will update this if/when I hear back from the seller about the remote. Yes, I should have checked for all the parts before installing I take responsibility for that but we installed several fans in the house at the same time and none of the others were missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Bear Mountain Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Super Fan
customer_reviews.text: Kind of awkward to install - but not difficult by any means! Love the fan, its super quite and the remote is Awesome!! I love this product I am buying 5 more just like it next pay day!! - Hint, The directions were not real clear on the remote and we struggled where/how to install the receiver. Yikes, it goes in the top shroud next to the ceiling :) UPDATE: 3/28/2019 Just bought a second unit. Super fast delivery. After installing the first fan, this one went up so fast, about 20 minutes!! Excellent ceiling fan. Thanks Hunter!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Saved my summer
customer_reviews.text: For obvious reasons, I spent the summer at my desk at home instead of in the air conditioned office. I have a small window AC, but it wasn't making much of a difference. The fan changed everything. Made it feel like I had real AC. I mostly used it on the 2 setting and was comfortable without feeling like something was actually blowing on me. It's so quiet. And the handyman said it was easy to install. Only one thing not great...the light is very weak. Not much stronger than a nightlight. The greatness of the fan is worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: not a fan of this fan
customer_reviews.text: Pros: nice looking fixture, attractive price Cons: instruction manual missing entire steps (and these were big steps such as when to attach blades and how to wire the remote control receiver), instruction manual really just of poor design in addition to missing pages, not as quiet of a fan as advertised, problems with the light dimmer on the remote (see other folks’ questions related to this). I was going to buy another one of these to match in another room, but I’ll go with another company next time.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Good product and quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with good instructions. Everything worked the first time. The Light didn't dim when I hold the light button on the remote? Called Hunter. Said that that feature needs to be enabled first. As a follow up you can toggle the dimming function by 1. Turn light switch off and back on 2. Within 3 minutes, hold down the fan off button while pressing the light button twice ( if the problem is not correct you can repeat process up to 5 times)
customer_reviews.author: tall2010

customer_reviews.title: Major install issues otherwise a good fan
customer_reviews.text: So terrible to install. I appreciate that they made such a low profile fan but the number of sacrifices to get there... Whew! The biggest issue is that you cannot level this fan. It takes on whatever angle your j-box has. Also your j-box needs to be perfectly flush with the bottom surface of your ceiling or you will not be able to get the screws in the top to close the fan up nor will the trim kit click in. Otherwise seems like a good little fan. I like that they are now dimmable which didn't used to be the case with this fan. For a small blade fan it puts out a decent amount of air too.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Young

customer_reviews.title: The light “blinks” from bright to dim repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks nice, is pretty quiet and is strong in a small room. The problem is, a couple of days after installation, the light started shorting out. When we turn the light on, it’s fine for a few minutes but then “blinks” to a very low light and then “blinks” back to regular. It does this repeatedly when the light is on.
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- issue with wiring
customer_reviews.text: Terrible ceiling fan. There is issues with these fans, this is not an isolated case. Issues I had include the following: 1. When you flip the wall switch from off to on while the light is set to off on the remote, the bulbs flash every single time. 2. While the lights are set to off, occasionally they flash on but not the biggest issue. 3. After 5 days after install, while the lights are set to on, the lights go off and on like a strobe light. Deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and they work well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered three for each bedroom. Very easy to install and they work well. One malfunctioned after a couple of weeks but customer service had a new remote module to me within only a few days.
customer_reviews.author: DATeem

customer_reviews.title: Directions are confusing and the fan has a clicking sound but I still like it!
customer_reviews.text: Fan clicks when it’s on, no matter what speed. Directions were confusing. There were 3 of us putting this thing together, 1 of is actually an engineer and we still had trouble figure it out. Finally got it together on the ceiling. *If you purchase this remember that pretty much everything but the light plate and fan blades get put together BEFORE hooking it to the ceiling and connecting all the wires! The picture shows the fan out together but the words weren’t there and we were reading words and not pictures... we felt like a bunch of dummies for not looking at the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P

customer_reviews.title: Quiet & easy to install but 2 units I had installed had flickering lights.
customer_reviews.text: Light flickers on/off by itself and when fan speeds up/down. Tried 2 units and the same. Pros easy to install and 1 was super quiet. Plus have 2 spots for LED bulbs so I can use daylight ones. Returning both. Can’t stand the flickering lights. And my electric is up to code & new wiring plus we used UL Push Connectors from Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Remote control never worked
customer_reviews.text: We had our electrician come to install this. He had to come three times b/c the remote never worked and the company sent us new parts for it twice. After the 2nd time and third visit from our electrician, we sent it back and gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Keep Healing

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer is not putting all the parts in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Received fan 2 separate times without remote control and remote associated parts. I have these fans in all the rooms of my house, I originally ordered them from Amazon, so when the blade and remote broke on the same fan( teenagers) I ordered another one a year and a half later. It was twice the price as the first time and the remote was missing and accompanying parts. Box looked factory sealed. I returned it and got another one same thing. I figured this must be a manufacturing error and they are not putting the correct lot of fans in the correct boxes. The box had the remote control on the outside stating it was included with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: EOM81

customer_reviews.title: bad loud fan
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I removed this after multiple calls and parts sent to me from Hunter. It's down, and I want to return it, but now I need to disassemble it (not easy) and put it back into the original box (very timely and difficult) to return. I don't like giving bad reviews and if Hunter can rectify the situation, I would consider re-reviewing the product since I believe mine is faulty. Fan is modern looking and looked great modern in bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Almost Great
customer_reviews.text: Hunter lost a star due to the remote control battery not being included and difficulty with one of the canopy screws. Very quiet fan. it's right overhead in my office, and I can speak on the phone or the internet with no issues. Only problem I had with installation is one of the canopy screws did not fit correctly - I had to widen the hole with a wood screw before getting it to work. It comes with two light bulbs, but I found one bulb is bright enough for my office. Be aware you must use the remote control to change fan speeds; there is no chain pull for neither the light nor the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Scott RL

customer_reviews.title: Remote operations is a major obstacle
customer_reviews.text: Remote needs to be repeatedly paired. Specifically the light is routinely difficult to turn on or off. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service was quick to identify and help solve problem
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Hunter Dempsey Fan I've purchased in the last year. I didn't have any problems with the first unit, however this unit immediately started flashing off while the unit was operating and would flash on (the lights) when the unit was off (big problem in the middle of the night when my daughter was sleeping, or trying to)! Customer Service at Hunter quickly identified the problem as a faulty receiver for the remote (it sounded like they've been having this problem a lot). Customer Service sent me a new receiver under warranty and I installed it the other day. The fan/light is now operating properly. I do like the unit overall...
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Fan would've been great, if the included to REMOTE and RECEIVER! SO PISSED..
customer_reviews.text: finally got a free minute from the kids to install this sucker and went through all the hard work and stress of doing so, only to find that the REMOTE and the RECEIVER for the remote isn't in the box. Talk about HORRIBLE Quality Control. Not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Kicks

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with customer service
customer_reviews.text: Fan arrived without remote control and remote receiver. Called Hunter. Left phone # for call back. Told by automated service that call back would be within 20mins. Got a call back 1.5hrs later. Rep took my info and told me expect parts to arrive 5-7 days. Rec'd parts 5 days later. Remote did not ship with CR2032 battery (instructions state its included). Way too much hassle for a fan. Otherwise, fan seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Alden

customer_reviews.title: Light flickers
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, nice look, everything is good... except the light flickers sometimes. Just once in a while... like every couple hours the light will flicker all the way off and immediately back on again. I know one other person on the planet who has the exact same fan and their light flickers too. It isn’t a deal breaker, but it is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: emfraz

customer_reviews.title: QUIET and GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: Our bedroom ceiling fan bit the dust and I had been searching for a replacement. I looked at Lowes, Home Depot and online at numerous fans. I wanted something simple, elegant, low profile and my husband's only requirement was an overhead light. This fan meets all of our needs and also has a remote which has been wonderful. This fan is super quiet and looks great in our room. We did end up hiring someone to install the fan which was well worth it since the switch was bad. I would highly recommend this fan and will be ordering additional to replace in other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, remotes needs some redesign.
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It's looks great, was simple to install, and is silent. My only qualms are that the remote mounting bracket is garbage. The design in general, needs a serious redesign. It falls out of its holder. It's designed to mount over your orignal wall switch. The hanger resembles a cheaply designed 3d printed prototype. For a guest room with minimal use, it's acceptable. I would not purchase this for a daily use device.
customer_reviews.author: CKent

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, good-looking, priced right.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my apartment after the existing fan stopped working, and when I inspected it the glass housing shattered. Quiet, perfect size for a general kids/guest bedroom. Super quiet, great remote mount/caddy that keeps you from powering off the unit out of habit. It mounts over the light switch. Looks great. Flipped to the wood side as it matches the fake, wood floors. These are great fans, and not worth spending more unless you have something special in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin M.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy install, works well with the remote. Remote holder is not secure
customer_reviews.text: The installation was straight forward and the remote works great. My only issue is that the remote holder (which you install over the light switch) holds the remote extremely loosely. We purchased this to solve the problem of not being able to have the fan on with the switch off (so it was a little difficult turning off the lights when you have eto use the pull chain each time). We keep the remote resting in its holder at all times, and anytime we push a button it wobbles around. I wish it were press-fitted a little more snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Purchased One Then repurchased Two more
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design Easy to install wanted a fan with LED lights but not LED that just goes from bright to dim I wanted to be able to change the color of light from white to color so I also purchased 2 LED light dimmable color changing light bulbs 10 watt with remote These two Items make a fantastic combo I like how the light/fan remote mounts over existing light switch if you want I should have posted a photo grandson likes his room in green granddaughter likes her room in pink I like blue
customer_reviews.author: Grandfather

customer_reviews.title: The instructions are horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never wrote a negative review before! They give you screw packages but do not label which screws go where. The wiring is instructions are even more difficult. They insist the blue wire from the fan gets connected to the blue or the black with white stripe wire from the fan..The problem is there are only 3 wires from the fan black, white and green. I have installed many ceiling fan this is the worst. I will call company tomorrow for assistance if not satisfied everything is getting shipped back half together!!!!! What a waste of time.welame fr
customer_reviews.author: Everitt F. Binns

customer_reviews.title: Works great - Freq is close to something, light flickers very random.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why but something in the house or near by is causing the light to flicker like I saw lightning outside. I'm thinking its something hitting a close frequency to the remote which is going to be difficult to fix if at all. 434Mhz I believe is noted on the back but that is SUPER close to area police radios and all sorts of other things. Should have had dip switches for diff freqs in remote.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Best fan!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Light is very bright and easy to dim. Even on 2 it puts out a lot of air flow. Great fan and looks very good. Better than more expensive fans. I have installed three different brands recently and this was the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price; good for 8” ceilings.
customer_reviews.text: Out this in the bedroom to replace one that’s pull corn for speed no longer works. Looks good though I had to get used to how wide it is. The light (using both bulbs) is truly a light and enables you to see well. Definitely not ambiance lighting. Remote works well. I do wish it was variable speed vs 1, 2, 3. It is loud, louder than any fan I’ve ever had, especially on high. Fortunately high blows things off tables so it’s not a dealbreaker. You get used to it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Long time amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Our fan did not come with a remote, remote sensor and remote handle that attaches to the wall. I was very displeased when I called Hunter Dempsey because the phone representative questioned me as to whether I had installed it properly. Difficult, if not impossible to install something when crucial components are missing.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio Avitia

customer_reviews.title: It's quite and cools the room
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a new fan since mine was not making my room any cooler. I am so glad I went with this fan. It's extremely quite Has 3 speeds (all the speeds make my room significantly cooler) It's a nice modern look. I bought it in white thinking I would use the white blades and was pleasantly surprised with the light wood color on the opposite side of the white blades. I decided to go with the light wood look and love it and if I decide to switch it to white I have that option!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Kurpinski

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this fan!  Not your parents Hunter fan company
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this fan. Apparently there is a known problem with the receivers. It was easy to install and appeared to be exactly what we were looking for. Not even two months into it the lights would turn on in the middle of the night. The lights would flicker occasionally and sometimes just turn off the fan. I just submitted a warranty request to Hunter and I will update after their response. Not looking very promising based upon reviews on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Too loud
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought a Hunter fan is because my previous one was whisper quiet, but this one might as well be a humming fluorescent light fixture about my bed. Also there is no way to operate it without the remote so if it breaks or gets lost its a real hassle.
customer_reviews.author: float tuber

customer_reviews.title: prior experience installing fan is a plus. Directions not very clear.
customer_reviews.text: nice fan and light combo. Fits the room well. Not real easy to install but the average person could do it in a couple hours, realistically. The IDIOT who designed the Blade installation should be FORCED to do it on their own. Kind of difficult the way you have to look up on a ladder,holding the blade and try and start the screw. While keeping the motor from turning. Engineers...what can I say.. All in all it's a nice fan
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Levels one and two are whisper quiet, which is what I was looking for. Level III makes some noise, but that would be true of any fan – it's just the sound of a greater volume of air being moved. Love the fact that the light is bright, unlike most other fan and light units. Wish there was a dimmer on the light, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Caboose

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Had to hire a professional and he had to jury rig just about everything to get this fan to work, including using the ceiling mount from the old fan that this one replaced because the ring that came with this fan was too small to fit the ceiling opening. Fan works well so far, but installation wound up costing as much as the fan and took a professional an entire afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Hunter quality slipping but price is right
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these from different vendors. On one, the HUNTER emblem wasn’t glued on. On another, the screw thread for one of the fan blades was defective so one blade has an errant bolt that only goes halfway through the hole. Irregardless, once finished it looks very professional and sleek and modern. The remote works perfectly and the LED light is very bright. The fans are smooth and noise free. The blades are reversible: white or a wood print.
customer_reviews.author: Snax McLovin

customer_reviews.title: This fan is garbage
customer_reviews.text: It was much more difficult to install than it should have been. Then it broke within two weeks of use. It just quit working and never worked again. I tried to troubleshoot it for a while but eventually I just took it down and went to lowes to buy a new fan. So 1 star for wasting my time and my money.
customer_reviews.author: Quiggie Boh

customer_reviews.title: Hunter sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Fan didn’t work, called hunter customer support, sent wrong part, didn’t work, after over an hour on chat they sent a new fan , new fan works but is noisy ... hunter fans a garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Molina

customer_reviews.title: Nice clean quiet 4 blade fan for small room
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a small sunroom. Overheats in afternoon. Size is perfect. Very quiet. Only a bit of noise on level 3 which I never need. Good light. Flush mount was necessary for the 9 ft ceiling. For the $$ works fine. Did not buy for looks only function. Nice clean & simple. Did take xtra time to install due to the room had no center electrical. Is surrounded by 4 small high hats. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!!! Easy to install so I love it too!!
customer_reviews.text: The fan is beautiful! Easy to install. Just take your time and read the instructions. I like that is has the ability to hang the motor on the mounting plate while you do the wiring instead of trying to hold it yourself. The battery for the remote is packed separately, that is not a spare. Have a very small Philips screwdriver ready to remove the remote battery cover. The remote allows you to stay in bed or in your recliner to dim the light, turn the light on or off, change the fan speed and turn it on or off also. Nice and quiet. Buy this fan!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randall G.

customer_reviews.title: Be Advised... Reverse Switch is Concealed Under the Globe
customer_reviews.text: The Fan Is Smooth and Quiet. Very Nice. However, there is no way to access the reverse switch without removing the glass Globe. The Globe is easily removable if you stand on your bed or use a step stool but sure seems very foolish.... Do you really want to have to go through that to reverse the fan motor? It should be easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jung

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Loud noise. Tried customer service and they said they could not accept videos to hear the sound. Not what Hunter used to be. Don’t buy it. Lights even came on randomly at night. Huge waste of my time installing two of these fans that suck.
customer_reviews.author: curt

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and low profile but
customer_reviews.text: We love the fan - it has made a huge difference for noise and coolness in our bedroom. It is very quiet and the light is more than sufficient. The lightswitch however is a pain - it is loose in the "holster" that is provided and sometimes takes many presses to turn the light on or off. Because this has taken the place of the main overhead light in our room, this is problematic....but the fan is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fan with NO Noise
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this fan. It works wonders. My bedroom is relatively large, but it keeps the whole room cool, despite what the A/C is set at. I also have never heard it make a single noise. No rattling, no swinging, no screeching. It’s a very quiet fan. The remote is great to have, but I’m giving it 4/5 stars because sometimes it’s not very responsive. Many times, I have to press the light button 2 or 3 times to turn on/off the light. This is my only complaint. Other than that, the fan is absolutely wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Martsolf

customer_reviews.title: Starts making weird noise after about a week of usage
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful look, style; not too bad to install; great remote; pushes plenty of air for a bedroom. Very frustrated that it sounds like a weird machine on each revolution. Not really a humming but more of an odd buzzing. We run our air purifier to drown out the noise because it's highly unlikely we would ever take it down. Wish products would be of quality and not routinely defective. Does Amazon use product testers? With all of the cash taken in every minute of every day I would expect no junk is being sold. But that's hilarious, right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, and easy to assemble and install. Quiet running. The only negative is the reverse switch. You have to remove the light globe in order to use the switch. Ideally a button on the remote would reverse the fan, or locating the switch on the fan housing outside the globe is another solution. If appearance is the issue, locate the switch near the "Hunter" logo. Most people make sure the logo is facing away from the room entry to preserve the fan's sleek appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Not what you would expect.
customer_reviews.text: We have three other Hunter fans in our house that are over ten years and I must say they are actually more silent than the new one. I installed rubber washers ( not included) under the mounting screws and that helped with the low drone. Other than that, we are very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective for winter heat distribution
customer_reviews.text: We bought two, one each in two small bedrooms, approximately 12x12. We set them on the winter setting and at the lowest fan speed they really distribute the warmer air at the ceiling back down to the floor around the perimeters of the room. The furnace works more efficiently with them on 24/7 and the heat is much more even for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: LJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Bought two for our guest rooms.
customer_reviews.text: These fans work great. The remote controls are an added benefit. No getting out of bed to change the fan speed or turn it off. Our guests love them. One very small drawback is that the amount of light from the included bulbs is not very bright. I will be replacing them with higher output bulbs soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Mack

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: This fan was very easy to install. It’s well built and low profile. It isn’t noisy at all and looks great. I purchased and installed two. Took less than an hour to install. I didn’t use the remote because of preference and instead wired the control to the switch on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Family of Five

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan and light but stopped working after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: The fan has a nice low profile, noise level at high speeds, decent lighting but stopped working after a six months. I am having the same issues as others. The fan/light would turn on for about 5 to 10 minutes then turn off. Now the fan/light will not turn on at all. I have a nice looking fan that does not work. I am going to replace it when I replace the other fans that I need to be replaced. I am not sure if I can trust the Hunter brand anymore. A lot effort was spent to hang the fan to have it stop working after 6 months. I need a fan that will last.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Clear and simple installation
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and complete with all components needed to install with an existing ceiling fan junction box. The directions and installation were plain and simple with all parts carefully packaged and easy to identify. Only one person is needed to complete the installation, which took about an hour from package opening to operation.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky Zoner

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan, I bought 3. The only issue I had was figuring out where red wire from house went. It goes with the blue wires from fan and receiver. To test if fan/light work, don't forget to close circuit by plugging the light wires. I forgot and was baffled why fan didn't work. I'm no electrician but comfortable with installing lights & fans. As always, kill the power at circuit breaker and check to confirm no power. I'm a 48 yr old female and had no major issues with install by myself. Good luck:)
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts in package however quickly resolved
customer_reviews.text: Timely delivery however remote was missing, extremely disappointing. Will attempt to contact manufacturer on Monday to resolve. ***UPDATE CONTACTED MANUFACTURER AND PROCESS TO RECEIVE REPLACEMENT REMOTE WAS EASY AND SMOOTH. CONVENIENT TO REACH A HELPFUL REPRESENTATIVE & REMOTE WAS SENT WITH SPEEDY DELIVERY.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Howard

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice fan, a little on the contemporary side
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice fan, a little on the contemporary side, maybe a little commercial looking for a bedroom but will certainly do. Different from the everyday fan which is a good thing. Have only had it up for 2 weeks, so hope it lasts. Nice and quiet so far. Only complaint is I wish the light was a little brighter. Does have a dimmer operation, but even on the brightest, it could be brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Squeeker

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, complicated assembly
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could be improved -- different screws are used in the assembly, and the drawings are inaccurate so you have to do it by trial and error. The fan is quiet at the slowest speed (~ 60 RPM), but there is a loud hum at higher speeds, from the mechanism and not the blades. The dimmer doesn't seem to work, but other reviews mention instructions received from customer support -- it would be nice to include them in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. Relatively easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an older, traditional styled Harbor Breeze fan that had begun to make some motor noise. The swap out was pretty fast and easy. As many have noted, instructions were not always the easiest to understand but I slowed myself down a little and made it through without incident. The new fan moves plenty of air around a 12x12 room with no noticeable noise.
customer_reviews.author: G. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great fan, easy to use, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for child's bedroom. Back side of the fan is light wood finish, so could use that as an option. Remote works perfectly and operates both light and fan. Much easier to use than the fan with a cord that you have to pull 50 times to get it to right speed.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Effective
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this fan. I always say to my wife, "How did we survive without this?" It is very comfortable on the medium setting. She is very sensitive to sound and this fan is very accommodating for that. Even thought it's a pretty plain design, I like how it looks. And the remote control is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Blue

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product, no response from company
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks great and works but the light glitches. We had a licensed electrician put it in and he told us there was a problem with two parts. I emailed the company asking for a replacement part and got no response. Very disappointed in the service.
customer_reviews.author: K. Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan-quite
customer_reviews.text: The fan is very quite. The only issue I have is if the remote inside the fixture breaks then there is no way to operate the fan. Unless you get a spare remote receptor that goes inside the light fixture, you may be forced to buy a whole new fan unit if it breaks. I did have issues with the light randomly shutting off and turning right back on again while I was standing in the room. Hasn't done it lately so maybe it fixed itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery and purchase was exactly as stated.
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased Hunter fans in the past. This one has the remote for light and fan speed. It's fantastic because I don't have to constantly reach for chains to change speeds or turn off light at bedtime. The remote can also reach from other rooms if I want to turn on light/fan before going in to bedroom. The blade length is perfect for the size room I have it in.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall
customer_reviews.text: FYI, lower light module must be plugged in to test fan motor with circuit breaker. light module takes 2 regular led 60w. fan motor base ceiling attachment did not have a ground wire in the housing to attach to incoming ceiling romex ground.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fresh
customer_reviews.text: This fan is close to the ceiling for our smaller room. It is a fresh and simple style. It’s quiet. A great size for a small room and gives great air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Failures / terrible fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these fans. None worked. they sent me 2 more and neither worked. Paid to have 2 fans installed and taken down, twice and still without a fan. Must go to Home Depot now to buy 3 fans and install myself. Lights flickered and fan shuts down and comes on for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Judge Smails

customer_reviews.title: Warranty deception
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 fans (2 different sizes). They are quiet and functional. That was unit the remote control sensor died. The warranty is life time for the motor not for anything else so they gave us some discount but we still had to pay $45 for the sensor. So not to happy and cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Why

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, only one fan/light wants to dim like it should
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks and works great... well one of them does. I ordered two. Both installed fairly easy but only one of them wants to actually dim like it is supposed to and now I can't get in contact with the seller (Hunter Fan). Hunter Fan, if you read this, please contact Me about this issue!!
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Air Flow
customer_reviews.text: What a great little fan! I love the look and it puts out quite a bit of air flow. My daughter’s room is 9x10 and it pushes more than enough air. Another perk is that it’s super quiet. I’m buying another one for the other bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: April&Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan
customer_reviews.text: Updating our workout room and needed a new fan. We needed low profile and this one looked as low as we could get. Suggest taking your time putting fan together and follow every single direction given. So beautiful. So quiet. Puts off a lot of cooling air in this small room. We love everything about it and buying another for one of the boys’ room.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie King

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elderly mother and she loves it! She loves the remote and I love that there is a wall mounted holder to keep track of it. It pushes a lot of air and is extremely quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Was not that easy to install. My dad has installed several ceiling fans and thought this was difficult/didn’t make sense. It’s beautiful and quiet so once installed I have no complaints! Love the low profile and lack of chains... my tall friends always hit their heads on the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I needed 3 of these, I’ve had to replace 2 of them. You have to completely install and uninstall before you figure out the motor is way to loud. 2 of them have had loud motors and 1 of them the light randomly turns on and off. 1 of them has been fine. It’s really time consuming to install and then uninstall again when it’s too loud. Of the 5 I have had 2 of them have had weird defects in the glass. My good fan is a great fan but quality control is awful. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: pski

product_meta.title: Hunter Dempsey Indoor Low Profile Ceiling Fan with LED Light and Remote Control
product_meta.description: The Dempsey modern ceiling fan with mass appeal will fit flawlessly in your home's modern interior design. The beautiful, clean finish options work together with the high contrast of angles throughout the design to create a look that will keep your space looking current and inspired. The LED light ceiling fan has fully-dimmable, high-efficient LED bulbs that give you total control over your lighting. The Dempsey fan features 13-degree blade pitch optimized to ensure ideal air movement and peak performance. This reversible fan comes with reverse rotation fan blades that keep the rooms in your home feeling cool during summers and warm during winters. Ideal for use in rooms or spaces with low ceilings less than 9’ in height.
feature_bullets: MODERN CEILING FAN: The contemporary Dempsey fan comes with LED light covered by cased white glass that will keep home interior current and inspired; Measures 44 x 44 x 11.03 Inch

MULTI-SPEED REVERSIBLE FAN MOTOR: Whisper wind motor delivers ultra-powerful airflow with quiet performance; Change the direction from downdraft mode during the summer to updraft mode during the winter
LED LIGHT KIT: Energy-efficient dimmable LED light bulbs let you control the lighting and ambiance of the living space; The long lasting bulbs have longer lifespan than traditional bulbs
UNIVERSAL HANDHELD REMOTE: Adjust the brightness of light and speed of the white ceiling fan with ease from anywhere in the room

ROOM PLACEMENT: Indoor fan is designed to be used in rooms with low ceilings, the low-profile housing fits flush to the ceiling; Ideal fan for living room, lounge, bedroom, children's room and nursery
Limited lifetime motor warranty is backed by the only company with over 126 years in the fan business. Airflow Efficiency: 69 cubic feet per minute per watt

specifications.Included Components: 1 Ceiling Fan, 4 Blades, 1 LED Integrated Light Kit, 1Handheld Remote
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,145 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
